oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Postcard entitled, "Maschinengewehr=Abteilung nach der Schlacht" (Machinegun squad after the battle)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Colorized postcard depicting a German machinegun squad. The men are seen wearing the early war pickelhaube helmets and lounging around a Maxim 1908 machine gun. The Maxim was the work horse of the German Army in WWI. The plane visible above the tree line was added to the Still Image and was not part of the original photograph.
